item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Pking can be fixed…

Add spec’s -
Good pking Area’s [be original just not too drastic I personally like the good ole’ Edgy Varrock deal.] Some people like ‘Pking area’s’ I personally don’t care for them.

Add somthing to make your PK’ing special, such as, Working prayer [saying you have a client if not don’t worry about it].

Working food [ as I don’t think Dodian has it?]

Read full topic

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @helcast helcast
item.description:
@helcast wrote:

lol, dodian is a pain in the ass… since nobody ever helps u with it ur stuck on ur own. I’ve never heard of the source that your using but if your a starting scripter use testscape even tho it is glitchy once in awhile it really ez to add stuff like new commands and changing the fighting exp
if your not go with dodian since its a stable source … somewhat
